scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run dev:styles | npm run dev:fonts | npm run dev:html | npm run dev:server | npm run dev:reloadBrowser
scripts.dev:html: npm run copyHtml | watch 'npm run copyHtml' ./src/html --interval=1
scripts.dev:images: npm run copyImages | watch 'npm run copyImages' ./src/images --interval=1
scripts.dev:fonts: npm run copyFonts | watch 'npm run copyFonts' ./src/fonts --interval=1
scripts.dev:styles: npm run styles | watch 'npm run styles' ./src/styles --interval=1
scripts.prod: npm run clean && npm run prod:styles | npm run prod:scripts
scripts.prod:styles: npm run styles && npm run css:min
scripts.styles: npm run sass && npm run css
